title: =。=无意间发现的奇葩JJ骑士
author: Rimo
txt_content:

  在某个村子附近我刷器官 然后见到了这2个。。。

replies.author: QAQTAT
replies.txt_content: 碉堡了

replies.author: m953568842
replies.txt_content: LZ你的运气不错

replies.author: PTmissionary
replies.txt_content: 自古整合坑新人。

replies.author: 游者如可得
replies.txt_content: 从未见过骑着蜘蛛的JJ怪，骷髅我见过好几次。

replies.author: a982617537
replies.txt_content: 碉堡了！

replies.author: LCL
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content: 碉堡了LZ

replies.author: 音乐家七月天
replies.txt_content: 从未看见过戴着头盔的蜘蛛！！

replies.author: qq1149284753
replies.txt_content: JJ怪也骑蜘蛛？
爬墙JJ怪耶
是MOD- -

replies.author: lys909
replies.txt_content: 装了MOD吧~。。话说JJ怪骑士会加速么？

replies.author: Give1329582145
replies.txt_content: 我也只见过骑蜘蛛的骷髅。。。苦力怕么。。。

replies.author: qq841312960
replies.txt_content: JJ骑士o.0，lz你太牛叉了吧！

replies.author: qq1575550349
replies.txt_content: JJ怪好可爱……如果它爆了蜘蛛会不会也死了。
好可爱撒~

replies.author: 茄子猫
replies.txt_content: Sssssssss..BOOM

replies.author: peterleung
replies.txt_content: thats impossible!
特殊怪物MOD  不解释- -...喵~~
你带着一个大脑……

replies.author: dseqe
replies.txt_content: MOD不解释 物品栏的大脑出卖了你
额~~~蜘蛛怎么成了这个样子？

replies.author: 0笑哈哈0
replies.txt_content: JJ怪像是被推（或挤）进去的- -

replies.txt_content: 好吧 楼主MOD

replies.author: NADICK
replies.txt_content: 你们这群见识短的家伙，我还见过史莱姆骑着LZ呢！
